Reviews.Title: GREAT!!!
Reviews.Author: MARCIA
Reviews.Content: It works fine, they sent me quickly, I'm satisfied customer.The product is the same as the picture.Thank you very much!!!

Reviews.Title: bought 5 for Christmas
Reviews.Author: Jacqlyn Haddock
Reviews.Content: I bought 5 of these tablets for my kids for christmas... one of them locked up on android screen three weeks ago and we havent been able to get it to do anything i have turned it off, pushed reset button n let it stay off for a week but ywt still just goes to android screen. The others seem to be good just 2 of them r really slow from minute they got them

Reviews.Title: suprised
Reviews.Author: tina wisdom
Reviews.Content: the price was excellent the tablet great quality and the graphics and usage is excellent my daughter loves it thanks for sending a good product.

Reviews.Title: wak
Reviews.Author: erica posey
Reviews.Content: This sh... Is wak freezes up bad not good for the money bullish.. I gave this to my daughter for Xmas so... Mad

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: cool game
Reviews.Content: the worst tablet you can ever buy it may sound good for the price the screen is not made out of glass like etc i pad kindle and most smart phones but when i got it the screen feels like a pc screen and yes its very easy to crack i had an hour of fun on it till it crack when i put the screen protecter

Reviews.Title: I don't like it
Reviews.Author: SHAK
Reviews.Content: I am thinking about returning this tablet, it run so slowly and view is so dark i bougth it has a gift for my sister as i know her, she won like it.... So will return it....l

Reviews.Title: afunta
Reviews.Author: kelly
Reviews.Content: I wasnt the happiest when i recived my tablet at first it was fine then i noticed most of my apps i downloaded would always forclose on me. The camera wasnt great and the charge didnt hold long needless to say i returned it and am looking for something a little more expensive so this doesnt happen again

Reviews.Title: Charger don't work
Reviews.Author: Dale Sewell
Reviews.Content: I am so appointed, the charger wont work and when i try to charge with usb it only charge for about %10 so maybe there is a battery problem as well

Reviews.Title: Android 4.0 Tablet
Reviews.Author: Evad Nee "Evadney"
Reviews.Content: I love the way it looks and the delivery from Amazon was right on schedule. After getting it in hand I realized that it was smaller than I expected and the  actual screen was only roughly about 8" by 4" which I consider very small. I was not pleased with the size, because I made a mistake and should have ordered a laptop on desktop computer.I guess if you really think about what you want to use it for and what is the purpose of a tablet it would be great if that's what you really want.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: Amanda j.
Reviews.Content: everything works perfectly and as described, battery life usnt the greatest. love it, goes everywhere with me. cant go wrong  with this one!

ProductInfo.Features:
9.2" multi-touch Capacitive screen, 800x480 pixel
Android 4.0.4 Ice Cream Sandwich, Camera
Cortex A8 at 1.5GHz
512MB RAM, 8GB storage
Skype video chat, HD games ,Netflix Movies
ProductInfo.Name: Afunta(tm) 9.2'' Google Android 4.0 512mb/8gb Tablet Dual Camera Capacitive Multiple Touch Screen G-sensor A13 Tablet, 3d Games Skype Video Calling, Netflix Movies (Dual Camera, White)
